scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev HEROKU_POSTGRESQL_CRIMSON_URL=$(heroku config:get HEROKU_POSTGRESQL_CRIMSON_URL -a basilic-mirabelle) ./node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -r esm src/server.js
scripts.resetDatabase: PORT=4001 NODE_ENV=dev HEROKU_POSTGRESQL_CRIMSON_URL=$(heroku config:get HEROKU_POSTGRESQL_CRIMSON_URL -a basilic-mirabelle) node -r esm ./standalone/resetDatabase.js
scripts.deployDatabase: heroku pg:copy HEROKU_POSTGRESQL_CRIMSON DATABASE_URL --app basilic-mirabelle --confirm basilic-mirabelle
